title: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) Equation
text: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) equation, we have $$t=\frac{x+1}{2}=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$$.

title: Substitute $$t$$ Into the y(t) Equation
text: Substitute $$t=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$$ into the y(t) equation, we have $$y=\left(\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}\right)^3-2=\frac{1}{{8\left(x+1\right)}^3}-2$$
